name: Black Spear

active.name: Oathsworn Bond
active.effects: Consumes this item to initiate a {{fd|3.5}}-second [[cast time]] and a 3-second {{tip|channel}} afterwards from the user and the target allied champion, both becoming bound allies. The target is unable to act for 6 seconds after the channel's duration. Afterwards, the target becomes an ''Oathsworn''.

effects_structured.raw: Consumes this item to initiate a {{fd|3.5}}-second [[cast time]] and a 3-second {{tip|channel}} afterwards from the user and the target allied champion, both becoming bound allies. The target is unable to act for 6 seconds after the channel's duration. Afterwards, the target becomes an ''Oathsworn''.

simpleDescription: Kalista's spear that binds an Oathsworn Ally.
